day #43 <<<<<<< HEAD /2010/02/12/2010-02-day-43-html/ Fri, 12 Feb 2010 15:10:00 +0000
/2010/02/12/2010-02-day-43-html/ ======= http://dev.jessicasmarquis.com/2010/02/12/2010-02-day-43-html/ Fri, 12 Feb 2010 15:10:00 +0000
http://dev.jessicasmarquis.com/2010/02/12/2010-02-day-43-html/ >>>>>>> minimal been reading through 1 thessalonians, & skipping over parts. this is amusing to me, as the book is only 4 pages long in the message bible. however, i found i couldn’t relate with some elements & moved on. and then i took a moment this morning to ask myself: why can’t i relate? what are those elements? the answer was this: i couldn’t relate with the intensity of love that paul expressed toward the thessalonians.
